templates.name: Are the Testo 550 digital HVAC gauges also a vacuum manifold?
templates.content:
The Testo 550 digital HVAC gauges are not a vacuum manifold in the traditional sense, but they can be used for vacuum measurements during system evacuation, which is why there's some confusion. 

What the Testo 550 does:
Measures refrigerant pressures (high and low side)
Calculates superheat and subcooling
Includes temperature sensors (usually clamp probes)
Has a built-in vacuum sensor, so it can monitor vacuum levels during evacuation (down to about 500 microns

What it doesn't do (as a full vacuum manifold):
It does not have a wide flow path like a dedicated vacuum manifold or vacuum-rated core removal tools do.
It's not ideal for pulling a deep vacuum quickly - it restricts flow compared to using large-diameter vacuum hoses and proper evacuation tools.
Can measure the vacuum during evacuation
Not optimized for pulling a vacuum efficiently

Recommendation:
Use the Testo 550 to monitor the vacuum, but use dedicated vacuum-rated hoses and core removal tools for the actual evacuation process.

templates.name: Do you have yellow jacket hoses?
templates.content: We don't carry Yellow Jacket brand hoses. Our recommendation would be the hoses from this category: https://www.trutechtools.com/vacuum-hoses.html

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We're not a brick and mortar store but we do ship to all 50 U.S states/territories and Canada as well.

templates.name: I received an email from No Fraud?
templates.content: Yes, this is from us, we use a fraud service that will vet orders and reach out to customers for further verification.

templates.name: Are your vacuums: VACUUM RATED?
templates.content: Yes, all vacuum products from Accutools are vacuum rated.

templates.name: Military discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can use code "6VET6" to get 6% off your order as well as free shipping (excludes A-JACKS, Fluke, Flir and Route protection).

templates.name: What is MeasureQuick?
templates.content: MeasureQuick is a smartphone app that works with many of our best selling tools. We work very closely with measureQuick and you can refer to measurequick.com if you have general questions about it.

templates.name: Difference between the BluVac micro and the BluVac Pro Plus
templates.content: The BluVac micro does the same basic process the BluVac Pro Plus does, but with much higher accuracy and other features that appeal to different customers. For more detailed info, please refer to the chart in the description of this product: https://www.trutechtools.com/Accutools-BluVac-Plus-Micro-Wireless-Digital-Micron-Gauge

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content: We're located at 3425 Gilchrist Road, Suite B, Mogadore, OH 44260.

templates.name: What are your payment financing methods?
templates.content: Affirm is definitely our most preferred Buy Now, Pay Later payment method. We also have PayPal Credit through PayPal and CreditKey for business accounts.

templates.name: Does the pipe clamp probe measure pressure?
templates.content: The pipe clamp probes don't measure pressure, they measure temperature of the liquid and suction lines of an AC system.

In the meantime, you're welcome to view which promotions we have running over here: https://www.trutechtools.com/promos

templates.name: Return Policy
templates.content: If any product doesn't satisfy your needs, or arrived damaged, it may be returned within 30 days of order receipt for a full refund. After the 30 day period, we recommend contacting the manufacturer directly, and we can always assist with that process. You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.trutechtools.com/howtoreturnmerchandise

templates.name: Restock (enabled for autosend)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website frequently, it will have the most recent ETA we have available. Is there anything else you like?

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: If a product comes with a manufacturer's warranty you can always see it under the add to cart button on the product page, it will say "This product comes with a manufacturer warranty." Further, for many products you have the option to purchase an extended warranty through Extend at the time of purchase, which you will also see under the add to cart button.

templates.name: Customer Support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@trutechtools.com, or give us a call at 1-888-224-3437. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you use No Fraud?
templates.content: Yes, we do use a service called NoFraud that will reach out to you if there is anything holding up your order from taking place.

templates.name: Payment Processors/What payment methods do you accept?
templates.content: We accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay (only on safari on an iOS device), Google Pay, Affirm, PayPal, PayPal Credit, CreditKey (financing for businesses) and emailed purchase orders.

templates.name: Can your vacuum pumps be used with freeze drying machines?
templates.content: No, they can't be used for freeze drying food because our vacuum pumps aren't intended for use with freeze drying machines.

templates.name: How can I add route to my order?
templates.content: Route can only be added via the cart page.

templates.name: What does reefer mean?
templates.content: Reefer means refrigeration.

templates.name: I can't see my order on my account
templates.content: Can I have your full name, email address and order number? We'll try locating your order and then link it to your account.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Orders are processed 7 days a week and most orders received before 3:00 pm EST will ship the same day, provided the product ordered is in stock. After your order is shipped, we will forward the tracking number so you can follow your package which will update with an ETA on delivery. At this time we don't ship internationally.

templates.name: Do you offer expedited shipping?
templates.content: We do offer expedited shipping from Monday - Friday, we exclude the weekends. If you place an order on Friday, next day air will be Monday. You'll see the available options at checkout.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://trutechtools.com/promotional-items-and-categories.html

templates.name: How long does a typical backorder take?
templates.content: Back Orders are usually fullfilled in 1 - 2 weeks after date of purchase or sooner. Keep in mind, manufacturing delays can impact fullfillment rate. If your backordered item(s) has taken longer than 2 weeks to ship, please check the items product page on our website for the latest ETA (Estimate Time of Arrival)

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship

templates.name: Price Matching
templates.content: We will attempt to price match a price you may see from a reputable online store. However, TruTech typically does not price match with auction sites or marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Walmart, etc. Can you please send me a screenshot or the link of the item you want us to price match alongside your phone number? I'll be happy to check on this with my team!

templates.name: How does the warranty work?
templates.content:
We cover the warranty for the first 30 days after purchase on most of the products that we sell. Hlimor, Refco, Supco JB, and Navac, we cover the full warranty.

After the in-house warranty, we recommend contacting the manufacturer directly if a tool needs servicing.

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $99. Maybe you can add something else to reach the min?
